summary: Adds a new Lore-Friendly Imperial Armor set to the game based on the Oblivion and Morrowind Version.
descriptionHtml:
[color=0000FF]Scrolls of the Elder Armor Series #1[/color]

One of my favorite Oblivion Armors was the Imperial Dragon Armor.
Not only did it look Amazing It was a token for beating the Game.

And i was disappointed to see that No such set was present in Skyrim.
So this mod is based around the same Concept.

[color=0000FF]~~~OBTAINING~~~[/color]

The set is found under the IMPERIAL Category.

It requires the Dragon Smithing Perk to craft.
(Not Working currently) It requires the Completion of the quest "Join the Imperial Legion"

[color=0000FF]~~~STRENGTH~~~[/color]

As it requires Dragon Smithing the set has been made +3 Times stronger than Vanila Ebony.
As it requires some work to get it's a decent reward for getting Dragon Smithing.
So it's not OP but it's a decent strength.

[color=0000FF]~~~APPEARANCE~~~[/color]

The set is not based Apperance-Wise on it's Oblivion Counterpart.
It uses the appearance of a Imperial Legion Champion type style.

[color=0000FF]~~~INSTALLATION~~~[/color]
The mod's installation is Simple.

Just drag all the files in the .zip Into your Data folder.
And in Nexus Mod Manager or any other Mod Manager Drag the Mod's .esp to the Top of the Load order.
I.E
Skyrim.esm
THISMOD.esp

[color=0000FF]~~~VIDEOS~~~[/color]
[youtube]3PjJoQsI_a8[/youtube]
Review by Nozi87

[color=0000FF]~~~CREDIT~~~[/color]
Faw, The maker of BSA Browser
AeonVita for the Cloak Mod(The Cloak Mesh and Texture in this mod is made by him.)
author: Japanga
